title: New SARS-CoV-2 variant gains dominance in US amid mild summer COVID wave

description: Zoom surprisingly decides its teams are more effective working in-office.

title: Amazon’s first Internet satellites will launch on Atlas V rocket—not Vulcan

title: Physicists achieve fusion with net energy gain for second time
description: Initial data shows an energy output greater than 3.5 megajoules.

title: Turning my Framework laptop into a tiny desktop was fun. Now it needs a job.
description: "Reuse" doesn't get as much attention as the other two Rs, but it's important.
